Note on the structure of the packageÔÉÅ

Note

The package QuantNBody is stuctured in 2 subpackages quantnbody.fermionic and quantnbody.bosonic which are respectively dedicated to fermionic and bosonic systems. Each subpackage contains a list of functions (encapsulated in a local tools module) one can use for creating/manipulating many-body operators/wavefunctions. In practice, to access all the functions, one only needs to import the following modules from quantnbody:

For fermionic systems
>>>  import quantnbody.fermionic.tools
For bosonic systems
>>>  import quantnbody.bosonic.tools

In the following, we detail the list of relevant callable functions for each type of many-body system.
